Title: Engineering Destruction
Description:
Some of the kobolds are retrofitting equipment left behind when the mines fell.

Please, destroy the rigs before they're used against us. I'd rather they be scrap than in the hands of an enemy.

There was a storage depot on the western edge of the lowest level of the mine. Start there.
ObjectivesText: Destroy mining rigs in the Lost Mines.
RewardText: Thank you. Our enemy now has one less advantage.
